user_request: Generate UGC ads for my language learning app in English, Spanish, and French
flow_description: Demonstrates localization with culturally-adapted hooks and platform-specific formatting

audience_hypotheses.core_pain: Classroom Spanish doesn't work in real conversations
Understand English but can't speak fluently
French education focuses on reading, not speaking

angle_maps.problem_hook_en: If you studied Spanish for years but still can't order at a restaurant
angle_maps.problem_hook_es: Si estudiaste inglés pero no puedes mantener una conversación
angle_maps.problem_hook_fr: Si tu as étudié l'anglais mais tu ne peux pas parler naturellement

localization_notes.es: Emphasize career benefits and professional growth
localization_notes.fr: Emphasize natural speaking vs textbook formality

hook_examples_en: If you studied Spanish for years but freeze when a native speaker talks to you...
POV: You finally understand Spanish conversations (not just textbook Spanish)
Confession: I took 4 years of Spanish and couldn't order tacos
hook_examples_es: Si estudiaste inglés pero te bloqueas en las entrevistas de trabajo...
POV: Finalmente puedes hablar inglés con confianza en el trabajo
Confesión: Estudié inglés por años y no podía hacer una presentación
hook_examples_fr: Si tu as étudié l'anglais à l'école mais tu ne peux pas parler naturellement...
POV: Tu parles enfin anglais comme un natif (pas comme dans les livres)
Confession : J'ai étudié l'anglais pendant 10 ans et je ne pouvais pas avoir une conversation

creative_routes.hypothesis: English speakers respond to relatable 'can't speak' scenarios
Spanish speakers motivated by career advancement
French speakers want natural, not textbook English

english_variant_1.hook: [0-3s] If you studied Spanish for years but freeze when a native speaker talks to you...
english_variant_1.body: [3-8s] I took 4 years of Spanish. Could pass tests. Couldn't order tacos. [8-13s] Then I found [App Name] - real conversations, not textbook drills. [13-17s] 3 months later, I'm chatting with my coworkers in Spanish.
english_variant_1.cta: [17-20s] Try 7 days free → Link in bio
english_variant_1.cultural_notes: US audience relates to classroom-vs-real-world gap

spanish_variant_1.hook: [0-3s] Si estudiaste inglés pero te bloqueas en las entrevistas de trabajo...
spanish_variant_1.body: [3-8s] Yo entendía inglés perfecto. Pero cuando tenía que hablar, me bloqueaba. [8-13s] Encontré [App Name] - practicas conversaciones reales, no gramática aburrida. [13-17s] Ahora hago presentaciones en inglés sin miedo.
spanish_variant_1.cta: [17-20s] Prueba 7 días gratis → Link en bio
spanish_variant_1.cultural_notes: LATAM audience motivated by professional advancement

french_variant_1.hook: [0-3s] Si tu as étudié l'anglais à l'école mais tu ne peux pas parler naturellement...
french_variant_1.body: [3-8s] J'ai étudié l'anglais pendant 10 ans. Je comprenais tout. Mais je ne pouvais pas parler. [8-13s] Puis j'ai trouvé [App Name] - des vraies conversations, pas des exercices ennuyeux. [13-17s] Maintenant je parle anglais couramment.
french_variant_1.cta: [17-20s] Essai gratuit 7 jours → Lien en bio
french_variant_1.cultural_notes: French audience frustrated by textbook vs natural speech

step_4_execution_plan.summary: Generate 6 UGC videos (2 per language) with localized hooks and cultural adaptation

steps.title: [English] Generate UGC image with text overlay

inputs.prompt: UGC selfie style, person looking confused, text overlay: 'STUDIED SPANISH FOR YEARS', 9:16 format

inputs.text: If you studied Spanish for years but freeze when a native speaker talks to you... [full script]

inputs.text: Si estudiaste inglés pero te bloqueas en las entrevistas de trabajo... [full script in Spanish]

inputs.prompt: UGC selfie style, student environment, text overlay: 'ANGLAIS SCOLAIRE VS RÉEL', 9:16 format

inputs.text: Si tu as étudié l'anglais à l'école mais tu ne peux pas parler naturellement... [full script in French]

targeting.fr: France market, emphasize natural vs textbook
